scripts.api-build: cd lufo-api ; eslint src ; rm -rf lib ; babel -q src/ -d lib/ ; flow-copy-source src lib
scripts.api-test: cd lufo-api ; eslint src ; echo "Error: no tests exist!" && exit 1
scripts.api-pack: yarn run api-build ; cd lufo-api ; yarn pack
scripts.api-doc: cd lufo-api ; eslint src ; rm -rf docs ; documentation build src/** -f html -o docs
scripts.cli-build: cd lufo-cli ; eslint src ; rm -rf lib ; babel -q src/ -d . ; chmod +x lufo.js
scripts.cli-test: cd lufo-cli ; eslint src ; echo "Error: no tests exist!" && exit 1
scripts.cli-pack: yarn run cli-build ; cd lufo-cli ; yarn pack
scripts.cli-run: yarn run cli-lint ; yarn run cli-build ; cd lufo-cli ; ./lufo.js
